content: सूचिः --ची {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [सूच्-इन् वा ङीप्] {@--1@} Piercing, perforating. {@--2@} A needle {@--3@} Sharp point or pointed blade (as of Kuśa grass); अभिनवकुशसूच्या परिक्षतं मे चरणं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; so मुखे कुशसूचिविद्धे <ls>Ś. 4. 13.</ls> {@--4@} The sharp point or tip of anything; कः करं प्रसारयेत् पन्नगरत्नसूचये <ls>Ku. 5. 43.</ls> {@--5@} The point of a bud. {@--6@} A kind of military array, a sharp column or file; दंडव्यूहेन तन्मार्गं यायात्तु शकटेन वा . वराहमकराभ्यां वा सूच्या वा गरुडेन वा <ls>Ms. 7. 187.</ls> {@--7@} A triangle formed by the sides of a trapezium produced till they meet. {@--8@} A cone, pyramid. {@--9@} Indication by gesture, communicating by sings, gesticulation. {@--10@} A particular mode of dancing. {@--11@} Dramatic action. {@--12@} An index, a table of contents. {@--13@} A list, catalogue. {@--14@} The earth's disc in computing eclipses (in <ab>astr.</ab>).
